text: Strangers When We Meet is a 1960 American romantic drama movie directed by Richard Quine and was based on the novel by Ed McBain. It stars Kirk Douglas, Kim Novak, Ernie Kovacs, Barbara Rush, Walter Matthau, Virginia Bruce, Nancy Kovack and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1960 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Richard Quine Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Strangers When We Meet (movie)
